mean_cn: v. 流浪；  n. 吉普赛人（等于gypsy），流浪汉
mean_en: a member of a race of people who travel from place to place, usually in caravans, rather than living in one place.
short_phrase: a gipsy wearing a red scarf
sentence: The gipsy fortune-teller told me I had just met a very attractive woman.
sentence_trans: 这个吉普赛占卜师说我刚刚认识了一位非常有吸引力的女人。
